languages.text: "Прошу прощения, что отрываю Ваше Светлость от дел, но я имею информацию особой важности, которую обязан донести как можно скорее".

"I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, что отрываю Ваше Светлость от дел, но я имею информацию особой важности, которую обязан донести как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "I apologise for having to distract Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

"I apologise for having to distract Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

"I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

"I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

"I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

languages.text: 「陛下、保護領の問題から、注意をそらしてしまって申し訳ありません。ですが、できるだけ早く伝えねばならない、極めて重要な情報がございます」
languages.original_text: "I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、保護領の問題から、注意をそらしてしまって申し訳ありません。ですが、できるだけ早く伝えねばならない、極めて重要な情報がございます」

languages.text: “我很抱歉打扰您重要的王朝事务，大人，但我得到了至关重要的信息，我必须尽快向您汇报。”
languages.original_text: "I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉打扰您重要的王朝事务，大人，但我得到了至关重要的信息，我必须尽快向您汇报。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je m'excuse de détourner votre attention des affaires du protectorat, mais je me dois de vous faire part d'une information de la plus haute importance aussi rapidement que possible. »
languages.original_text: "I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je m'excuse de détourner votre attention des affaires du protectorat, mais je me dois de vous faire part d'une information de la plus haute importance aussi rapidement que possible. »

languages.text: «Lamento distraer a mi{mf|lord|lady} de la gestión del protectorado, pero hay información vital que debo proporcionarle de la manera más inmediata posible».
languages.original_text: "I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento distraer a mi{mf|lord|lady} de la gestión del protectorado, pero hay información vital que debo proporcionarle de la manera más inmediata posible».

languages.text: "Verzeiht mir, dass ich Euch von Euren Protektoratspflichten abhalte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber es gibt wichtige Informationen, die ich Euch schnellstmöglich mitteilen muss."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht mir, dass ich Euch von Euren Protektoratspflichten abhalte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber es gibt wichtige Informationen, die ich Euch schnellstmöglich mitteilen muss."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, protektoranın meselelerine ayırdığınız vakti çaldığım için affedersiniz ama size derhâl bildirmem gereken hayati öneme sahip bir malumat var."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for distracting Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} from matters of the protectorate, but there is information of crucial importance that I am compelled to report to you as expediently as possible."
